import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { CartContext } from '../contexts/CartContext' export default function Pizza({ pizza }) { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1) const [varient, setVarient] = useState('small') const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (

{pizza.name}

Variedades

Cantidad

Price: {pizza.prices[0][varient] * quantity}CLP

{pizza.name}

{pizza.description}
) }
